title: niccc
description: A program for conducting certain NIML tests on input from streamspec and write the results to stderr

streamspec.title: Stream specification
streamspec.description: A string defining a NIML stream

duplicate.title: Duplicate Flag
duplicate.description: Duplicate the element before showing it. This is to test NI_duplicate function.

nodata.title: No Data Flag
nodata.description: Show header parts only in output

attribute.title: Attribute
attribute.description: Dump the value of attribute ATTR

match.title: Match
match.description: Match attribute: If MATCH is exact, then attribute name is matched exactly. If MATCH is partial, then a match of all the characters in ATTR is enough.

string.title: String Flag
string.description: Streamspec is an element string like: '<T font=9 coords="2.3 23 2"/>'

stdout.title: Stdout Flag
stdout.description: Write elements to stdout, instead of stderr

hash.title: Hash Flag
hash.description: Put the # at the beginning of lines with no data

quiet.title: Quiet Flag
quiet.description: Quiet stderr messages, and don't echo attribute name with -attribute option

find_attr.title: Find Attribute
find_attr.description: Only output elements that have an attribute ATTR of value ATTRVAL.

skip_attr.title: Skip Attribute
skip_attr.description: Do not output elements that have an attribute ATTR of value ATTRVAL.
